title: KTP Life App
summary: Mobile app for Kappa Theta Pi members to track events, projects, and resources.
description: A mobile app built with SwiftUI and Flutter, integrated with Firebase for authentication and real-time data sync.

title: Legend of Zelda (1986) Clone
summary: A recreation of the original Legend of Zelda built in Unity.
description: Built core gameplay mechanics, enemy AI, and level design using Unity and C#.

title: Digit Speech Recognizer
summary: Speech recognition model for spoken digits.
description: Implemented signal processing and model training in Python to recognize spoken digits from audio samples.
